name: Elden Ring
description: A vast open-world RPG from the creators of Dark Souls. Journey through the Lands Between in a brutal and mysterious fantasy world shaped by legendary author George R.R. Martin.

name: Baldur's Gate 3
description: A rich narrative-driven RPG set in the Dungeons & Dragons universe. Command your party, make impactful decisions, and shape the fate of the Forgotten Realms in a sprawling fantasy epic.

name: Split Fiction
description: An indie narrative puzzle game where reality splits at every decision. Navigate a fractured world of parallel stories and piece together the truth behind your identity.

name: Shadow Recon: Delta Protocol
description: A futuristic tactical shooter with repetitive missions, clunky AI, and limited multiplayer support. Launched with high ambitions but fell short of expectations.

name: Fury Kart Drift
description: A chaotic arcade kart racer with colorful tracks and exaggerated powerups. Lacks depth and polish but can be entertaining with friends in short bursts.
